ygData.subject: RE: efrium
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh great, now someone will see that bug and he will become a haste proc ing Ghoul Eecutioner.  Ouchy. ... From: mstokes [mailto:mstokes@tddny.fujitsu.com]
ygData.messageBody:
Oh great, now someone will see that bug and he will become a haste proc'ing
Ghoul Eecutioner. Ouchy.

-----Original Message-----
From: mstokes [mailto:mstokes@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 1:59 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] efrium


From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

Nope,

He carries the Axe, but he never wields it. Hence, no graphic and no
slashh messages.

>
>
> --- James Agay <jamesa@...> wrote:
> > While I think you are correct about the previous
> > post being full of crap,
> > you can tell what weapon a mob has without there
> > being a graphic by reading
> > the damage messages, (a kobold pierces you, a kobold
> > hits you, a kobold
> > slashes you...etc.)
> >
> >
> >
> > >
> > > From: "Michael McGrath" <pagansmurf23@...>
> > >
> > > ok, this isn't a bash on anyone, but ready this
> > guys posts just makes me
> > > laugh, he appears to have all this knowledge about
> > tinkering and the pets
> > > then the next post he says "charmed the
> > executioner cuz he had an
> > > axe" ? i
> > > dont' think so, first of all you can't charm if
> > you have a
> > > pet/animation, or
> > > ppl could make multiple animations, and secondly
> > the ghoul exec has no
> > > animation for when he holds the axe. so you
> > couldn't possible have seen
> > > it...
> > >
> > > you just lost all your credibility man
> > >
> > > Daey Faroth
> > > 50th Necro
